DOC.HEADLINE: LET ' S GET_TOUGH WITH UNLICENSED DRIVERS TOO
DOC.TEXT: * Assemblywoman Richard Katz ' s proposed legislation for the state to seize automobiles driven by unlicensed drivers does not go_far enough.Those driving without insurance also should suffer the penalty of vehicle forfeiture . We who struggle to meet state-imposed financial_obligations are forced into financial ruin and made to feel_like fools by those who do not obey the law . The government should not allow people to continue illegal behavior at the expense of everyone else . CAROLINE MIRANDA North Hollywood
